The NEC is chaird by the Prime Minister. Executive Committee of the NEC (ECNEC) sanctions development projects in PSDPs that cost more than Rs. 7.5 billion and are according to the sanctioning limits approved by the NEC and notified/issued by the M/o P&SI.
